meanings.definition: A person or thing that quips.
meanings.sent1: The comedian was known as the king of quippers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading books with clever quippers in them.
meanings.sent3: The quippers at the party had everyone laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit turned her into a true quipper among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The little girl was a natural quipper, always making everyone smile.

meanings.definition: To make a quip or witty remark.
meanings.sent1: She quippers whenever she feels nervous.
meanings.sent2: He quippers during meetings to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent3: The students quippered back and forth during the class discussion.
meanings.sent4: His ability to quipper quickly made him popular among his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The comedian quippered effortlessly, making the audience burst into laughter.
